TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit ListObjectExtensions extends System.Object

summary.span: 通过为 对象生成主机控件，以及测试是否存在已生成的主机控件，提供可用于扩展 Microsoft Office Excel 列表对象的方法。

span.span: Provides methods you can use to extend Microsoft Office Excel list objects by generating host controls for objects and by testing for the existence of the generated host controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类包含*扩展方法*旨在上访问对象。The class contains *extension methods* that are designed to be accessed on objects. 有关扩展方法的详细信息，请参阅[扩展方法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/175ce3ff-9bbf-4e64-8421-faeb81a0bb51)和[扩展方法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b8020aae-374d-46a9-bcb7-8cc2390b93b6)。For more information about extension methods, see [Extension Methods](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/175ce3ff-9bbf-4e64-8421-faeb81a0bb51) and [Extension Methods](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b8020aae-374d-46a9-bcb7-8cc2390b93b6). 中的扩展方法类都重定为向后兼容的 Office 项目，从.NET Framework 3.5 到[!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]或[!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)]。The extension methods in the class are provided for backward compatibility with Office projects that you retarget from the .NET Framework 3.5 to the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)] or the [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)]. 在面向 [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)] 或 [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)] 的新项目中，应调用由您的项目中的 `GetVstoObject` 对象提供的 `HasVstoObject` 和 `Globals.Factory` 方法。In new projects that target the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)] or the [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)], you should call the `GetVstoObject` and `HasVstoObject` methods that are provided by the `Globals.Factory` object in your project. 有关详细信息，请参阅[扩展 Word 文档和 Excel VSTO 外接程序在运行时中的工作簿](/visualstudio/vsto/extending-word-documents-and-excel-workbooks-in-vsto-add-ins-at-run-time.md)和[文档级自定义项编程](/visualstudio/vsto/programming-document-level-customizations.md)。For more information, see [Extending Word Documents and Excel Workbooks in VSTO Add-ins at Run Time](/visualstudio/vsto/extending-word-documents-and-excel-workbooks-in-vsto-add-ins-at-run-time.md) and [Programming Document-Level Customizations](/visualstudio/vsto/programming-document-level-customizations.md).

MemberSignature.Value: public static Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ListObject GetVstoObject (this Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.ListObject listObject, Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ApplicationFactory factory);

.method public static hidebysig class Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ListObject GetVstoObject(class Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.ListObject listObject, class Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ApplicationFactory factory) cil managed

param.name: listObject
param.span: 要扩展的本机列表对象。

span.span: The native list object to extend.

param.span: 请勿自己提供此参数。

span.span: Do not supply this parameter yourself.

param.span: 在 Excel 列表对象中调用此方法时，运行时会提供此参数。

span.span: When you call this method on an Excel list object, the runtime supplies this parameter.

param.name: factory
param.span: 一个对象，可访问应用程序级外接程序中某些功能。

span.span: An object that provides access to certain features in your application-level add-in.

param.span: 将 对象传递到此参数。

span.span: Pass the object to this parameter.

summary.span: 返回一个 主机控件，它可扩展应用程序级外接程序中当前 对象的功能。

span.span: Returns a host control that extends the functionality of the current object in an application-level add-in.

summary.span: 将项目中的 Globals.Factory 对象传递到 参数。

span.span: Pass the Globals.Factory object in your project to the parameter.

returns.span: 一个主机控件，可扩展当前 对象的功能。

span.span: A host control that extends the functionality of the current object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在应用程序级外接程序，调用此方法以扩展在 Excel 中打开任何列表对象。In an application-level add-in, call this method to extend any list object that is open in Excel. 此方法将生成一个新主机控件，如果已为生成无此对象对其调用此方法的对象。This method generates a new host control if no such object has already been generated for the object on which you call this method. 后续调用此方法对同一个对象返回相同实例。Subsequent calls to this method on the same object return the same instance. 此方法用于实现与 Office 项目 (将其目标从 .NET Framework 3.5 重定为 [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)] 或 [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)]) 的向后兼容。This method is provided for backward compatibility with Office projects that you retarget from the .NET Framework 3.5 to the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)] or the [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)]. 在面向 [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)] 或 [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)] 的新项目中，应调用由您的项目中的 `GetVstoObject` 对象提供的 `Globals.Factory` 方法。In new projects that target the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)] or the [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)], you should call the `GetVstoObject` method that is provided by the `Globals.Factory` object in your project. 有关详细信息，请参阅[扩展 Word 文档和 Excel VSTO 外接程序在运行时中的工作簿](/visualstudio/vsto/extending-word-documents-and-excel-workbooks-in-vsto-add-ins-at-run-time.md)。For more information, see [Extending Word Documents and Excel Workbooks in VSTO Add-ins at Run Time](/visualstudio/vsto/extending-word-documents-and-excel-workbooks-in-vsto-add-ins-at-run-time.md).

MemberSignature.Value: public static Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ListObject GetVstoObject (this Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.ListObject listObject, Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Factory factory);

.method public static hidebysig class Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ListObject GetVstoObject(class Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.ListObject listObject, class Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Factory factory) cil managed

param.name: listObject
param.span: 要扩展的本机列表对象。

span.span: The native list object to extend.

param.span: 请勿自己提供此参数。

span.span: Do not supply this parameter yourself.

param.span: 在 Excel 列表对象中调用此方法时，运行时会提供此参数。

span.span: When you call this method on an Excel list object, the runtime supplies this parameter.

param.name: factory
param.span: 一个对象，用于提供对文档级自定义中某些功能的访问权限。

span.span: An object that provides access to certain features in your document-level customization.

param.span: 将 对象传递到此参数。

span.span: Pass the object to this parameter.

summary.span: 返回一个 宿主控件，该宿主控件可扩展文档级自定义项中的当前 对象的功能。

span.span: Returns a host control that extends the functionality of the current object in a document-level customization.

summary.span: 将项目中的 Globals.Factory 对象传递到 参数。

span.span: Pass the Globals.Factory object in your project to the parameter.

returns.span: 一个主机控件，可扩展当前 对象的功能。

span.span: A host control that extends the functionality of the current object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 文档级自定义项，可以调用此方法以获取主机当前自定义项中的控件。In a document-level customization, you can call this method to get a host control that is in the current customization. 如果的基础对象不是在其调用此方法的对象主机控件中当前自定义情况，此方法返回`null`。If the object on which you call this method is not the underlying object of a host control in the current customization, this method returns `null`. 此方法用于实现与 Office 项目 (将其目标从 .NET Framework 3.5 重定为 [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)] 或 [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)]) 的向后兼容。This method is provided for backward compatibility with Office projects that you retarget from the .NET Framework 3.5 to the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)] or the [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)]. 在面向 [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)] 或 [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)] 的新项目中，应调用由您的项目中的 `GetVstoObject` 对象提供的 `Globals.Factory` 方法。In new projects that target the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)] or the [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)], you should call the `GetVstoObject` method that is provided by the `Globals.Factory` object in your project. 有关详细信息，请参阅[文档级自定义项编程](/visualstudio/vsto/programming-document-level-customizations.md)。For more information, see [Programming Document-Level Customizations](/visualstudio/vsto/programming-document-level-customizations.md).

MemberSignature.Value: public static bool HasVstoObject (this Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.ListObject listObject, Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ApplicationFactory factory);
.method public static hidebysig bool HasVstoObject(class Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.ListObject listObject, class Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ApplicationFactory factory) cil managed

param.name: listObject
param.span: 要测试的本机列表对象。

span.span: The native list object to test.

param.span: 请勿自己提供此参数。

span.span: Do not supply this parameter yourself.

param.span: 在 Excel 列表对象中调用此方法时，运行时会提供此参数。

span.span: When you call this method on an Excel list object, the runtime supplies this parameter.

param.name: factory
param.span: 一个对象，可访问应用程序级外接程序中某些功能。

span.span: An object that provides access to certain features in your application-level add-in.

param.span: 将 对象传递到此参数。

span.span: Pass the object to this parameter.

summary.span: 返回一个值，该值指示是否为应用程序级外接程序中的当前 对象创建 主机控件。

span.span: Returns a value that indicates whether a host control has been created for the current object in an application-level add-in.

summary.span: 将项目中的 Globals.Factory 对象传递到 参数。

span.span: Pass the Globals.Factory object in your project to the parameter.

returns.span: 如果已为当前 对象创建 主机控件，则为 ，否则为 。

span.span: if a host control has been created for the current object; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在应用程序级外接程序，你可以调用此方法以确定是否宿主控件存在任何对象。In an application-level add-in, you can call this method to determine whether a host control exists for any object. 通常情况下，你可以使用此方法以测试存在托管你想要关闭或保存的 Excel 列表对象之前保留的控件。Typically, you use this method to test for the existence of managed controls that you want to persist before closing or saving an Excel list object. 此方法用于实现与 Office 项目 (将其目标从 .NET Framework 3.5 重定为 [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)] 或 [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)]) 的向后兼容。This method is provided for backward compatibility with Office projects that you retarget from the .NET Framework 3.5 to the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)] or the [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)]. 在面向 [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)] 或 [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)] 的新项目中，应调用由您的项目中的 `GetVstoObject` 对象提供的 `Globals.Factory` 方法。In new projects that target the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)] or the [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)], you should call the `GetVstoObject` method that is provided by the `Globals.Factory` object in your project. 有关详细信息，请参阅[扩展 Word 文档和 Excel VSTO 外接程序在运行时中的工作簿](/visualstudio/vsto/extending-word-documents-and-excel-workbooks-in-vsto-add-ins-at-run-time.md)。For more information, see [Extending Word Documents and Excel Workbooks in VSTO Add-ins at Run Time](/visualstudio/vsto/extending-word-documents-and-excel-workbooks-in-vsto-add-ins-at-run-time.md).

MemberSignature.Value: public static bool HasVstoObject (this Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.ListObject listObject, Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Factory factory);
.method public static hidebysig bool HasVstoObject(class Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.ListObject listObject, class Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Factory factory) cil managed

param.name: listObject
param.span: 要测试的本机列表对象。

span.span: The native list object to test.

param.span: 请勿自己提供此参数。

span.span: Do not supply this parameter yourself.

param.span: 在 Excel 列表对象中调用此方法时，运行时会提供此参数。

span.span: When you call this method on an Excel list object, the runtime supplies this parameter.

param.name: factory
param.span: 一个对象，用于提供对文档级自定义中某些功能的访问权限。

span.span: An object that provides access to certain features in your document-level customization.

param.span: 将 对象传递到此参数。

span.span: Pass the object to this parameter.

span.span: Returns a value that indicates whether a host control has been created for the current object in a document-level customization.

span.span: Pass the Globals.Factory object in your project to the parameter.

returns.span: 如果已为当前 对象创建 主机控件，则为 ，否则为 。

span.span: if a host control has been created for the current object; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 文档级自定义项，此方法返回`true`才的基础对象是在其调用此方法的对象主机当前自定义项中的控件。In a document-level customization, this method returns `true` only if the object on which you call this method is the underlying object of a host control in the current customization. 否则，此方法返回 `false`。Otherwise, this method returns `false`. 此方法用于实现与 Office 项目 (将其目标从 .NET Framework 3.5 重定为 [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)] 或 [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)]) 的向后兼容。This method is provided for backward compatibility with Office projects that you retarget from the .NET Framework 3.5 to the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)] or the [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)]. 在面向 [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)] 或 [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)] 的新项目中，应调用由您的项目中的 `HasVstoObject` 对象提供的 `Globals.Factory` 方法。In new projects that target the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)] or the [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)], you should call the `HasVstoObject` method that is provided by the `Globals.Factory` object in your project. 有关详细信息，请参阅[文档级自定义项编程](/visualstudio/vsto/programming-document-level-customizations.md)。For more information, see [Programming Document-Level Customizations](/visualstudio/vsto/programming-document-level-customizations.md).
